Detailed Description

Uses ray bundling to improve integration speed, points which lie in the same voxel are "merged" into a single point.

Raycasting and updating then proceeds as normal. Fast for large voxels, with minimal loss of information.

◆ integratePointCloud()

void voxblox::MergedTsdfIntegrator::integratePointCloud ( const Transformation &  T_G_C,
const Pointcloud &  points_C,
const Colors &  colors,
const bool  freespace_points = false 
)
virtual

Integrates the given point infomation into the TSDF.

NOT thread safe.

Parameters
freespace_pointsif true points will only be integrated up to the truncation distance. Used when we are given a minimum distance to a point, rather then exact distance. This is useful for clearing out free space.

Implements voxblox::TsdfIntegratorBase.
